name: See You Soon, Space Cowboy
description:
In this action game you need to protect your train for the rest of the trip.

You need to repaire mechanical devices in carriage while getting under attack by villains.

Be cautious to be able to terminate the trip alive with a working train.

" It's been a long time, but we are not done yet. "

Create By Thekom, Monnier and Alice during the Epic Megajam 2020.

AKA See You Soon Space Cowboy team
